attributes.action: Award Imran Khan Prime Minister of Pakistan Nobel Peace Prize Ambassador 2 Peace
attributes.additional_details: Imran Khan newly elected Prime Minister of Pakistan in short period has shown great mercy to his neighbours for his Nobel Actions. Imran Khan has become the pioneer of peace, justice, respect and dignity. The captured Wing Commander Abhinandan Varthaman India's pilot entered Pakistan's Airspace illegally who was shown respect and mercy then released. The world needs to understand the importance of making peace between their neighbours without conflict. Imran Khan deserves a Nobel Peace Prize.
attributes.background: Imran Khan Pakistan's Prime Minister who has taken steps to show the world that to avoid any conflict shown mercy to India's Wing Commander Abhinandan Varthaman and released with Mercy and Respect. Imran Khan deserves an applause and a Nobel Peace Prize who showed great respect to his Neighbours.

rejection.details: The UK Government and Parliament aren't responsible for the Nobel Peace Prize.
